tool_description: Social Animal's Share Count API lets you retrieve counts of how many times any given URLs were shared on popular social media sites.
name: Share Count
title: Share Count

api_list.name: Share Count API
api_list.description: Social Animal's Share Count API lets you retrieve counts of how many times any given URLs were shared on popular social media sites. Social Animal Share Count API supports the most popular social media websites. Please see response example below to get an idea.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://share-count1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/articles/share_counts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "share-count1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://share-count1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/articles/share_counts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "share-count1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
